actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet

official_title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide for the use of unexpended universal service funds in low-income schools, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Children's Access to Technology Act - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to allow unexpended universal service funds to be used (within certain monetary limits) by schools in low-income areas to acquire information services, including devices necessary to access and use such services.

titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide for the use of unexpended universal service funds in low-income schools, and for other purposes.
